backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing building management system with user profiles, building creation, invite codes, and role-based access control (binaSahibi, yetkili, sakin) with security fixes preventing multiple building assignments.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON summaries of all frontend source files including components, pages, hooks, and utilities for the building management application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes with building management color scheme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Turkish title 'Bina Yönetim ERP Uygulaması' and root div mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application with TanStack Router setup, Internet Identity authentication, protected routes, and profile setup flow for all pages including dashboard, users, building members, and announcements.
frontend/src/components/BuildingCreateFo: Form component for creating new buildings with validation, loading states, error handling, and success callbacks using shadcn/ui components.
Invite code management panel with role-based code creation (binaSahibi, yetkili, sakin), code listing with status badges, copy functionality, and role-specific permissions enforcement.
frontend/src/components/InviteCodeRegist: A form component for registering with a 16-character alphanumeric invite code, with validation, role-based messaging, and mutation handling via useRegisterWithInviteCode hook.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component that wraps pages with a Navigation component, container styling, and a footer with branding and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with desktop and mobile (Sheet) menus, displaying menu items (Dashboard, Home, Announcements, Members, Users, Profile) and logout functionality using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend operations including user profiles, buildings, invite codes (create, list, register), with automatic cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components (primary, secondary, muted, destructive, charts, sidebar) using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/Announcements.tsx: Displays and manages building announcements with priority levels. Allows building owners and authorities to create announcements; includes mock data and role-based access control.
frontend/src/pages/BuildingMembers.tsx: Shows building members list derived from invite codes and displays member statistics by role. Includes role-based visibility and info about backend development status.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page showing user status, login information, and principal ID. Displays welcome message and first-login indicator with user profile data.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page with role-based content showing building details, invite code statistics, and onboarding flows. Handles building creation and invite code registration based on user role.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page with three user type options (building owner, authority, resident) using Internet Identity authentication. Stores onboarding flow selection before login and redirects authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Profile page component displaying user information including Principal ID, authentication method (Internet Identity), session date, account status, and user role with loading states and Turkish localization.
frontend/src/pages/UserDetail.tsx: Empty file placeholder for user detail page functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Users.tsx: Users list page component with placeholder implementation showing a development notice; displays table structure for user list with Principal ID, name, role, and first login columns in Turkish.
frontend/src/utils/roleTranslations.ts: Utility functions for translating Role enum values to Turkish display names (Bina Sahibi, Yetkili, Sakin) and mapping roles to badge variants (default, secondary, outline).
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter parsing utilities supporting both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence functions for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, Inter font family, custom animations, and design tokens for sidebar, cards, and charts.
project_state.json: Project state document defining a multi-tenant building management ERP system with Internet Identity authentication, role-based access (Bina Sahibi, Yetkili, Sakin), phased development strategy, and existing features for authentication, dashboard, navigation, and user management.
